reason.raw: GUI and rendering will not use transport between them for now
reason.html: GUI and rendering will not use transport between them for now

description.raw:
Proposal of a message to define motion constraints based on [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/38/support-camera-tracking-and-following) ign-rendering pull request. Initially, the message would be used to define how a camera will track an entity in the world, but I tried to keep the message general enough so it may apply to other entities besides cameras. 

I thought it made more sense to start a new message than trying to adapt the existing [track_visual](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/src/dae89a2405bbde1b6e9b8cb082b50b01c03cc22a/ignition/msgs/track_visual.proto?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) message. In fact, I think if this one is accepted, we should deprecate that one.
description.html:
Proposal of a message to define motion constraints based on this ign-rendering pull request. Initially, the message would be used to define how a camera will track an entity in the world, but I tried to keep the message general enough so it may apply to other entities besides cameras.

I thought it made more sense to start a new message than trying to adapt the existing track_visual message. In fact, I think if this one is accepted, we should deprecate that one.

Proposal of a message to define motion constraints based on this ign-rendering pull request. Initially, the message would be used to define how a camera will track an entity in the world, but I tried to keep the message general enough so it may apply to other entities besides cameras.

I thought it made more sense to start a new message than trying to adapt the existing track_visual message. In fact, I think if this one is accepted, we should deprecate that one.

reason: GUI and rendering will not use transport between them for now
